titleStmt.title: Alexipharmacon, or, A fresh antidote against neonomian bane and poyson to the Protestant religion being a reply to the late Bishop of Worcester's discourse of Christ's satisfaction, in answer to the appeal of the late Mr. Steph. Lob : and also a refutation of the doctrine of justification by man's own works of obedience, delivered and defended by Mr. John Humphrey and Mr. Sam. Clark, contrary to Scripture and the doctrine of the first reformers from popery / by Isaac Chauncey.
titleStmt.author: Chauncy, Isaac, 1632-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for, and sold by W. Marshall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
